actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to create a bipartisan commission to recommend ways to strengthen the protection of classified information and eliminate the classification of nonsensitive information.
short_title: Protection and Reduction of Government Secrecy Act

summary.text: Title I: Short Title - Protection and Reduction of Government Secrecy Act - Sets forth the short title of this Act. Title II: Commission on Protecting and Reducing Government Secrecy - Establishes a commission to recommend ways to reduce the volume of information classified and to increase protection of classified information. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Protection and Reduction of Government Secrecy Act
A bill to create a bipartisan commission to recommend ways to strengthen the protection of classified information and eliminate the classification of nonsensitive information.
